#summary Why and how to use Prolepsis.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Prolepsis tracks players online on Dolera. It displays their name, level, vocation and guild. The foreground text color indicates your stance towards that character. The background color indicates how long they've been on or offline.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2"/>

= Installation =

== Noobs ==

Download the latest version [http://anacrolix.googlecode.com/files/prolepsis-0.2.0_win32.rar here]. Extract the archive, and double click on *prolepsis.exe* inside the folder that appears.

== Technical Users ==

*Recommended software on Windows*
 * [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.6.2/python-2.6.2.msi Python 2.6.2 Windows installer]
 * [http://sourceforge.net/project/downloading.php?group_id=138498&filename=TortoiseSVN-1.5.9.15518-win32-svn-1.5.6.msi TortoiseSVN] _(only if you intend to checkout the source code)_

[http://code.google.com/p/anacrolix/downloads/list Download the desired source archive] or checkout from http://anacrolix.googlecode.com/svn/projects/prolepsis/trunk.

Double click prolepsis.py. Be sure to update regularly!

= Colors =

|| *Foreground Color* || *Stance* ||
|| Black || Unknown or no specific stance ||
|| Red || Enemy ||
|| Green || Ally ||
|| Blue || Friend ||

*Note: Character stances will override guild stances.*

|| *Background Color* || *Status* ||
|| Yellow || Online ||
|| White || Logged in very recently (or you recently started the application) ||
|| Grey || Offline for less than 15 minutes ||
